Nightlight::

Nightlight followed Rodimus, what would happen? she didn't know. 
Perhaps, she had done a big mistake leading Vampirtron to the base 
and now...

"What happen Rodimus???" said Nightlight "is something relationed 
with vampirtron?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus picks up Vampirtron as his body goes limp. He places him on 
the table and locks him down with shackles.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Kenzo I want you to keep and eye on him. Act as 
security.
> 
> Rodimus starts to walk out of the room.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Nightlight, come here for a moment.
> 
> He motions for her to join him just outside the doorway.
